Securely send and request large attachments using MangoShare.

Securely send and request large attachments directly from your Gmail inbox using MangoShare.

The MangoShare Chrome Extension allows you to securely share files via email while bypassing attachment size restrictions. Get notified whenever someone accesses a file or sends you a file so you never miss a beat. 

An MangoShare account is required. You can sign up for a demo at https://mangopractice.com/demo
